queries.querystring:
SELECT is_t.TABLE_SCHEMA AS 'Schema', is_t.TABLE_NAME AS 'Name', is_t.TABLE_TYPE AS 'Type',
IF ( ei.TABLE_NAME IS NULL, 'Local', 'Datamart' ) AS 'Source' FROM information_schema. TABLES AS is_t LEFT JOIN entityinfo ei ON is_t.TABLE_NAME = ei.table_name WHERE is_t.TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbnode' ORDER BY ei.TABLE_NAME -- limit 30,10
